member.name: T:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic
member.summary: Helps AI to auto-continue on the task.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.AutoContinue(System.String)
member.summary: Use when you can't provide an answer in one response and need to split the answer. Use after reply when user asks to generate answers with permission to continue. Continue with the next part of the reply after this function call return "Please continue".
member.returns: The output message to reply from the user.
member.param: Reserved. Send empty string as a value.
member.exception: Error message explaining why execution failed.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.GetWebPageContents(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve content of websites by URL.
member.param: URL which points to the resource.
member.returns: The output of request.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.StartProcess(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Execute a process on user computer. Use `System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo`
member.param: Application or document to start.
Command-line arguments to use when starting the application.
The working directory for the process to be started. Default is empty string.
member.returns: The output of the started process.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.
member.remarks: Be cautious with executing process requesys received via API due to security risks.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.RunPowerShellScript(System.String)
member.summary: Execute a PowerShell script on user computer.
member.param: The PowerShell script to be executed.
member.returns: The output of the executed PowerShell script.
member.exception: Error message explaining why the request failed.
member.remarks: Be cautious with executing scripts received via API due to security risks.

member.param: The file to read from.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.Basic.WriteFile(System.String,System.String)

The string to write to the file.

member.name: T:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.ListItem
member.summary: Represents a versatile list item used in various contexts such as TODO lists, environment variable management, and diverse list compilations. Structured as a key-value pair with an optional comment, facilitating a broad spectrum of applications from settings configuration to task management. Aides in organizing data in a simple, yet effective manner, offering hints for creative AI utilization beyond predefined uses.

member.name: P:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.ListItem.Key
member.summary: The unique identifier or name for the list item.

member.name: P:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.ListItem.Value
member.summary: The value associated with the key.

member.name: P:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.ListItem.Comment
member.summary: Optional. Provides additional information about the list item, such as task status (e.g., complete, pending) or extra details for settings and environment variables. It encourages to infer potential statuses or metadata that could enhance data handling or task management strategies creatively.

member.name: T:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.RiskLevelAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the risk level of a method or a class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified risk level.
member.param: The risk level to be assigned.

member.summary: Provides functionalities for interacting with Documents and solutions in Visual Studio, handling errors, and formatting code.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ISolutionHelper.GetAllSolutionDocuments
member.summary: Retrieves all Documents throughout the entire solution.
member.returns: A collection of all Documents within the solution.

member.summary: Retrieves all Documents within the project of the currently active Document.
member.returns: A collection of Documents from the same project as the active Document.

member.name: M:JocysCom.VS.AiCompanion.Plugins.Core.VsFunctions.ISolutionHelper.GetDocumentsOfProjectOfSelectedDocument
member.summary: Retrieves all Documents within the project of a Document selected by the user.
member.returns: A collection of Documents from the project of the selected Document.

member.summary: Retrieves all Documents currently selected in the Solution Explorer.
member.returns: A collection of Documents selected in the Solution Explorer.

member.summary: Retrieves all Documents that are currently open in the editor.
